description: This file appears to be an include configuration or recipe script for building a cross-compiled version of Go, specifically 'go-cross-canadian'. It contains dependency declarations, environment variable setups, build commands, installation procedures, and wrapper script creation related to building Go for a specific target architecture within an embedded Linux or Yocto project.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Sets environment variables for cross-compilation, navigates into the source directory, runs the Go bootstrap build, then returns to the previous directory.

methods.name: make_wrapper
methods.description: Creates a shell wrapper script for invoking Go tools with environment variables set for target architecture and sysroot.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built Go toolchain components into the staging directory and creates necessary wrapper scripts.
